title: Emily Ratajkowski looks chic in the city while sporting a beret and mini dress
text:
Emily Ratajkowski definitely knows how to make a city street her runway - even when walking her dog.

The Gone Girl actress stepped out in New York City on Friday, turning heads in a stunning black outfit with her four-legged friend Colombo right by her side.

She continued on with her fall boot trend as she stepped out in the fall-inspired outfit while rocking a pair of statement boots.

Mom and dog date: Emily Ratajkowski knows how to make a city street her runway when out walking her pup Colombo in New York City on Friday afternoon

The 28-year-old donned a leather jacket with the sleeves pulled up a bit for the chilly afternoon in New York.

Underneath the coat she wore a black dress with a silver belt wrapped around her waist.

She pulled the entire look together with a black beret and a pair of white high heels boots.

Model behavior: The Gone Girl star donned a leather jacket with the sleeves pulled up a bit for the chili afternoon in New York

About a week ago, the brunette bombshell was spotted out in the city for a fun day of work while filming for an upcoming Beats commercial.

She appeared to be having fun as she rocked a pair of the white headphones while sporting a tan blazer and a black pair of leggings.

After the shoot, she was seen snapping pictures for the brand for the upcoming campaign which has yet to be released.

Staying busy: About a week ago, the brunette bombshell was spotted out in the city for a fun day of work while filming for an upcoming Beats commercial

Recently, she's been keeping busy with her clothing line Inamorata that she launched back in 2017 as a swimwear line.

Since the launch, she has expanded into more womenswear pieces and is seen frequently on social media promoting the new pieces.

Ratajkowski has been modeling since she was just 14 years old after getting signed to Ford Models and later rose to fame in Robin Thicke's Blurred Lines music video.

Other than her box office hit Gone Girl, she has also appeared in Entourage, I Feel Pretty, as well as other modeling gigs.
description: The Gone Girl actress stepped out in New York City on Friday, turning heads in a stunning black outfit with her four-legged friend Colombo right by her side.
